definition: along the way/the duration of a journey
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge

sentences.english: There are flowers between the trees along the road .
sentences.chinese: 沿路兩旁的樹木之間都種着花草。

sentences.english: Before long, along came this little old man.
sentences.chinese: 過了不久，沿路來了一個小老頭。
坦克轟隆轟隆地沿路開過。

sentences.english: One day he put the hats into his barrow and went along the road to the market.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他把帽子放進手推車裏，沿路去市場。

sentences.english: He came ambling down the road.
sentences.chinese: 他沿路溜溜達達地來了。

sentences.english: The plow banked the snow along the side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 掃雪車把雪沿路邊堆積起來。

sentences.english: He trundled a wheel barrow down the path.
sentences.chinese: 他推着手推車沿路走過。

sentences.english: Hansel, with his pocket full of pebbles, dropped them one by one.
sentences.chinese: 漢森口袋裏裝滿了小石頭，沿路丟石認路。

sentences.english: An old woman came along the road leaning on her staff.
sentences.chinese: 有一個老太婆拄着手杖沿路走過來。

sentences.english: He vends fruit from a cart.
sentences.chinese: 他推着車沿路叫賣水果。

sentences.english: I last saw him beetling off down the road.
sentences.chinese: 我上次見到他，他正快步沿路而去。
他推着車沿路叫賣水果。

sentences.english: At a quarter past seven on the morning of February 8, I was walking along the road to the east.
sentences.chinese: 2月8日早晨7點15分，我正沿路向東走。
坦克車沿路咕隆咕隆響地行。

sentences.english: The old man dogtrotted along the road.

definition: along the sides of the road/by the wayside
the whole journey/all the way/going the same way/going in the same direction/of the same kind
all the way/all along/since the start
